title: AS PERFECT AS HER EMPEROR NEEDS
content:

[[=]]
+ [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7866/comments/show Saint Hedvig will be exactly as perfect as her Emperor needs her to be]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:as-perfect-as-her-emperor-needs/image0%20%283%29.png]]

> A little sketch I did inspired by SCP-7866 by [[*user Miss Lapis]]! I hope you enjoy it <3 
> If you like this, you should check out my [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Author Page]. There's a lot of cool art there, and I write as well. :) 
> 
> The black lines surrounding her throat and mouth show her stolen voice, the emptiness left in its place. Her dress is gold, like the city of Amoni-Ram, and her crown and the gears glow brightest, showing how her personhood as been outshone by her purpose. The red around her represents the crossing of boundaries, where she's been disrespected and stripped of her agency. I tried to really capture the feel of the piece, showing her trapped without specifically drawing or picturing the abuse she's enduring. I hope it worked.

[[/=]]
